title: Anyone lived in or been to alaska?
body:
I'm just curious. I wanna move there with the girl i'm talking to and she's  giving me all these statistics saying that it's the "rape capital" of the US and that they have a crazy high suicide rate and the mosquitos are massive.

I feel like the only real "true" thing is that the mosquitos are huge. I can live with that, honestly.

And lets just say the rape rate is high, according to what i read, that applies to natives and native americans. Indians basically. Rape rates are always higher for people who are not... white essentially. 

The suicide rate i feel like applies to people who have lived their the WHOLE LIVES and get depressed cause it's in the middle of..nowhere.

Also, she said there is nowhere in walking distance but that's why you live in or near a city and then use public transit if necessary.

My neighbors went there and loved it.

There's an entry level position in alaska. it pays sixteen an hour. plus free housing and free meals.

The best paying job i've ever gotten in florida with no experience was 11. the minimum wage here is like 8.

Why should i NOT go?
